Hi everyone just noticed this comment...

Iniscor posted.

ULTRA MEGA SUPER DUPER IMPORTANT MUST REAAAAD!!!

If you are playing the DLC mission Priority: Eden Prime then you may encounter a certain bug that always happends no mather what, after watching a certain video and you reagain control of shepard the game will crash, to fix it you must wait until you regain control and press ESC a bunch of times to fix it otherwise is going to crash as soon as you regain control .

Wrong altough it might work this is a wellknown bug even with a legit bought Game!!!!

The fix is this:-

If the game crashes/freezes for you after you view the data on a computer.
Find the other computer in the level, which is down to the left as you leave the Prothean Life Pod,
then up into a room. You'll find it!!
As there are two computers in the level that you need to collect data from,
you need to collect that data from that one first as they need to be viewed in order.
It is a well known "Bug".
This stops the game from crashing.
